typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as string,
		time as string,
		text as string,
		event_type as string,
		event_type2 as string,
		side as string,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as string,
		shot_outcome as string,
		is_goal as string,
		location as string,
		bodypart as string,
		assist_method as string,
		situation as string,
		fast_break as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Events
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GameInfo
Events derive(player = iifNull(player,'NA'),
		event_team = iifNull(event_team,'NA'),
		opponent = iifNull(opponent,'NA'),
		event_type = iifNull(event_type,99),
		event_type2 = iifNull(event_type2,99),
		shot_place = iifNull(shot_place,99),
		shot_outcome = iifNull(shot_outcome,99),
		location = iifNull(location,99),
		bodypart = iifNull(bodypart,99),
		assist_method = iifNull(assist_method,99),
		situation = iifNull(situation,99)) ~> CleanNULL
CleanNULL, GameInfo join(Events@id_odsp == GameInfo@id_odsp,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinData
JoinData select(mapColumn(
		id_odsp,
		id_event,
		sort_order,
		time,
		text,
		event_type,
		event_type2,
		side,
		event_team,
		opponent,
		player,
		player2,
		player_in,
		player_out,
		shot_place,
		shot_outcome,
		is_goal,
		location,
		bodypart,
		assist_method,
		situation,
		country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as integer,
		time as integer,
		text as string,
		event_type as integer,
		event_type2 as integer,
		side as integer,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as integer,
		shot_outcome as integer,
		is_goal as integer,
		location as integer,
		bodypart as integer,
		assist_method as integer,
		situation as integer,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> gameEvents
